articles.title: Quinn Ewers named starting quarterback for Texas Longhorns
articles.description: Quinn Ewers, who transferred to Texas from Ohio State after having not attempted a pass last season, beat out Hudson Card to be the starting quarterback for the Longhorns in 2022.

articles.title: Jacoby Brissett looks to 'prove every day' he's right QB to replace Deshaun Watson for Cleveland Browns

articles.title: Top-ranked Iga Swiatek questions why US Open still uses different tennis balls for men and women
articles.description: Reigning world No. 1 Iga Swiatek says the balls used at the US Open are "horrible" and wonders why the final major of the season is the only Grand Slam that still uses different balls for the men and women.

articles.title: Kamaru Usman, challenger Leon Edwards make weight for UFC 278 welterweight title fight
articles.description: Kamaru Usman and challenger Leon Edwards successfully made weight Friday morning -- both at exactly 170 pounds -- for their welterweight title fight in the main event of UFC 278 on Saturday at Vivint Arena.

articles.title: Atlanta Braves' Marcell Ozuna arrested on DUI charge
articles.description: Braves outfielder Marcell Ozuna, who missed most of the 2021 season after his arrest for domestic violence, was charged with DUI on Friday, according to jail records.
articles.content:
Atlanta Braves outfielder Marcell Ozuna was arrested early Friday morning on a DUI charge, according to Gwinnett County Jail records.
